alert.note: Alert for Copper River Basin (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 14 at 9:57AM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 AM AKDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by snowmelt is occurring. * WHERE...Localized areas along the Copper River, including along the Old Edgerton Highway near the Richardson Highway. * WHEN...Until 930 AM AKDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 941 AM AKDT, the Department of Transportation reported rapid snowmelt is occurring, and is causing minor flooding with water over portions of the Old Edgerton Highway near the Richardson Highway. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly localized areas along tributaries to the Copper River - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
